sn_cmp_cloud_template.body: AWSTemplateFormatVersion: 2010-09-09 Description: >- AWS CloudFormation Template ACE-Initial-Wordpress-Lab: A Template for provisioning the Web Server used in the ACE ITOM End To End Demo. **WARNING** This template creates 3 Amazon EC2 instances. You will be billed for the AWS resources used if you create a stack from this template. Parameters: LABCODE: Description: Users LAB Code Type: String SubNet: Description: VPC Subnet Type: String SecGroup: Description: Security Group Type: String Default: sg-0d93dcf2e42ac18a8 WWWAMI: Description: Word Press AMI Type: String Default: ami-0092d6a99a2167204 WWWNAME: Description: Word Press VM Name Type: String Default: ACE-SD-WWW- Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': dd65b9fa-6064-4d48-b03c-e012a61ba6c1: size: width: 60 height: 60 position: x: 370 'y': 190 z: 0 embeds: [] Resources: Wordpress: Type: 'AWS::EC2::Instance' Properties: InstanceType: t2.small ImageId: !Ref WWWAMI SubnetId: !Ref SubNet SecurityGroupIds: - !Ref SecGroup KeyName: ACE-Linux-SSH Tags: - Key: Name Value: !Join - '' - - !Ref WWWNAME - !Ref LABCODE - Key: OSType Value: Linux Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: dd65b9fa-6064-4d48-b03c-e012a61ba6c1
sn_cmp_cloud_template.name: Site Depot Wordpress
